modName: Dragonborn Three Craftable-Upgradable Dragon Priest Masks
summary: Ahzidal, Dukaan and Zahkriisos Craftable and Upgradable Masks
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn DLC provides three extra Dragon Priest Masks Ahzidal, Dukaan and Zahkriisos.

Ahzidal- Increases Fire Resistance by 50% and Fire Spell Damage by 25%
Dukaan- Increases Frost Resistance by 50% and Frost Spell Damage by 25%
Zahkriisos-Increases Shock Resistance by 50% and Shock Spell Damage by 25%

They`re all craftable under the Daedric section, and Upgradable at a Workbench 
The Daedric Smithing Perk isn`t required.

Unenchanted Version soon :)

My other Mods-
Miraaks Armour Sword and Staff Craftable-Non Enchanted-Upgradable-Enchantable
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31258

Dragonborn Craftable-Upgradable-Disenchantable Rare Weapons 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31303
author: Rudeeyy
